sources.ms_copies_score: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, B.I.114, 'Sonata a quattro no. 7...'
ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.611a, 'Quartetto no. 2...' (for comment, see No. 171)
Münster, Priesterseminarbibliothek, Santini HS. 530, 'Opera IIIa, Concerto secondo...' (for comment, see No. 171)
Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.2.10, and 22.5.2, 'Quartetto no. 2...'
sources.first_edition: December, 1772, Paris, Vénier: Op. 10 no. 6 (for title, see No. 171)
later_editions: (c. 1780), London, Bremner: Op. 10 no. 6 (for title, see No. 171)
(c. 1785), Amsterdam, Hummel: Op. 7 no. 6 (for title, see No. 171)
(c. 1785?), London, Preston: Op. 10 no. 6 (for title, see No. 171)
(c. 1790), Paris, Boyer: Op. 10 no. 6 (for title, see No. 171)
sources.modern_edition: (c. 1930?), Leipzig, Peters: Op. 10 no. 6 (separate parts; revised by R. Hofmann). This edition was re-published c. 1943? by the International Music Co., New York
